src: "Manje sinamagundane anezinyanga ezingu-4 angenawo ushukela ayenoshukela," wanezela.
mt: "We haven't been able to find him for four days now," he said.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: UDkt. Ehud Ur, uprofesa wezokwelapha eNyuvesi yaseDalhousie eHalifax, eNova Scotia kanye nosihlalo womnyango wezokwelapha nowesayensi weCanadian Diabetes Association uxwayise ngokuthi ucwaningo lusanda kuqala.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association, says the study is promising.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Njengezinye izazi, unokungabaza ngokuthi isifo sikashukela singalashwa, ephawula ukuthi lokhu okutholakele akubathinti abantu abanoHlobo ike some other experts, he lukashukela.
mt: As with other experts, he said the disease is not going to be eradicated, but it can be controlled, he said.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: NgoMsombuluko, uSara Danius, unobhala wesikhathi sonke weKomiti yeNobel yeZincwadi kuyi-Akhademi yase-Sweden, umemezele obala phakathi nohlelo lomsakazo eMsakazweni we-Sveriges e-Sweden ukuthi ikomiti, njengoba lingakwazi ukufinyelela uBob Dylan ngokuqondile ngokuwina Umklomelo weNobel weZincwadi, liyeke imizamo yokumfinyelela.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, which awards the Nobel Prize in Literature, announced the committee, as it knew how to handle Bob Dylan's refusal to accept the Nobel Prize in Literature, was trying to find a way to deal with it.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: UDanius wathi, “Okwamanje asenzi lutho. Sengishayele ucingo ngaphinde ngathumela ama-imeyile kwabasondelene naye kakhulu asebenzisana nabo futhi ngathola izimpendulo ezinobungane. Okwamanje, lokho ngokuqinisekile kwanele.”
mt: “It was a very difficult decision. I had to think about it for a while and consult with my family and friends and get their advice. I think it’s the right decision,” he said.
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Phambilini, isikhulu esiphezulu sakwa-Ring, u-Jamie Siminoff, sathi le nkampani yaqala ngenkathi kungezwakali ukuthi kukhona ongqongqozayo emnyango uma esesitolo sakhe esisegalaji lakhe.
mt: Earlier, the company's founder, Jamie Siminoff, said the company began with the idea that there was a need for a doorbell when he noticed a lack of one at his own home.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Wakhe insimbi yasemnyango yeWiFi, washo.
mt: 2.4 GHz WiFi antenna, left.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: USminoff uthe izintengo zanyuka ngemva kokuvela kwakhe embukwisweni we-Shark Tank ngo-2013 lapho iphaneli yohlelo yenqaba ukusekela ibhizinisi ngezimali.
mt: 2013, Minoff appeared on Shark Tank, where he pitched his company to investors for funding.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Ekupheleni kuka-2017, iSiminoff yavela ohlelweni lokuthengisa lukamabonakude iQVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff was fired from his position as CEO of QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: U-Ring ngi wabuye waxazulula icala nenkampani ancintisana nayo yezokuphepha, i-ADT Corporation.
mt: 1-Ring is a subsidiary of ADT Corporation, a security company.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Nakuba umjovo wokulinga ubonakala ukwazi ukunciphisa ukufa okubangelwa yi-Ebola, kuze kube manje, ayikho imithi eboniswe ngokucacile ukuthi ifanelekela ukulapha isifo esikhona.
mt: While the Ebola outbreak has been contained, there is no vaccine to prevent the disease from spreading.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: I-cocktai eyodwa nje emzimbeni, ZMapp, ekuqaleni ibonakale ithembisa ensimini, kodwa ngokocwaningo kubonisa ukuthi inomthelela omncane kunalowo obucatshwangwa ekuvimbeleni ukufa.
mt: 1 dose of ZMapp, initially given intravenously, but now shows promise in treating Ebola.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Ekuhloleni kwe-PALM, i-ZMapp yasebenza njengesifaniso, okusho ukuthi ososayensi bayisebenzisa njengesiqalo sokuqhathanisa futhi baqhathanisa amanye amakhambi amathathu okwelapha nayo.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp worked as a treatment, showing that scientists used it as a control and treated three other patients who survived.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Ukuzivocavoca Kokuqinisa Imisipha Namathambo kwaseMelika kusekela incwadi yeKomiti lama-Olimpiki laseMelika futhi kwamukela isidingo esiphelele sokuba umndeni wama-Olimpiki ukhathaze indawo ephephile yabadlali bethu bonke.
mt: 2012 Olympics Committee and the IOC have been criticized for allowing a Russian company to sponsor the Olympics and for not having a more diverse group of sponsors.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Sivumelana nokushiwo yi-USOC ukuthi izithakazelo zabadlali kanye namaqembu, kanye nemidlalo yabo, zingakhonzwa kangcono ngokuyaphambili ngoshintsho olunenjengo phakathi kwenhlangano yethu, kunokuthathelwa izitifiketi.
mt: 2012 USOC officials say that the Olympic and Paralympic teams, as well as their coaches and staff, will be required to wear the official uniform of the United States at the opening ceremony, and will not be allowed to wear any other clothing.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: I-USA Gymnastics isekela uphenyo oluzimele olungaveza ukukhanya endleleni ukuhlukumeza kobukhulu obuchazwe ngesibindi yilabo abasinde kuLarry Nassar obekungenzeka kungabonwa ngayo isikhathi eside kangaka futhi yamukela noma iziphi izinguquko ezidingekayo nezifanele.
mt: USA Gymnastics has been criticized for its slow response to the allegations against Larry Nassar, which were not reported until years later and may have been covered up.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Ezokuzivivinya komzimba zaseMelika kanye ne-USOC zinomgomo ofanayao — ukwenza umdlalo wezokuzivivinya komzimba, kanye neminye, iphephe ngangokunokwenzeka ukuba abadlali balandele amaphupho wabo endaweni ephephile, enhle kanye nenika amandla.
mt: 2012 Olympic hopefuls — and others — are taking advantage of the opportunity to train in a high-altitude environment, where athletes can improve their endurance and altitude tolerance, and where coaches can test their athletes' performance in a low-oxygen environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Kuyo yonke iminyaka yawo-1960, uBrzezinski wasebenzela uJohn F. Kennedy njengomeluleki bese uhulumeni kaLyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as a foreign policy advisor and later for Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Phakathi nokhetho luka-1976 waluleka uCarter ngemithetho yakwamanye amazwe, bese wakhonza kuyiNational Security Advisor (NSA) kusuka ngo-1977 kuya ku-1981, ethatha isikhundla sikaHenry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, Carter was criticized by other countries for his human rights policies, and he served as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Njenge-NSA, usize uKhatha ngokuphatha izindaba zezwe ngokuhlakanipha, njengeSivumelwano seKamu Davide, ngo-1978; ukwenza kube nobudlelwane obuvamile phakathi kweMelika neShayina ekupheleni kwawo-1970; Ushintsho lwase-Iran, olwaholela enhlekeleleni yezithunjwa zase-Iran, ngo-1979; kanye nokuhlasela kweSoviet e-Afghanistan, ngo-1979.
mt: As the NSA, he was responsible for the collection of foreign intelligence, such as the 1978 Camp David Accords; the secret negotiations between the United States and China in the early 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the fall of the Shah of Iran in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Ifilimu, eno-Ryan Gosling noEmma Stone, ikhethelwe ukuwina kuzo zonke izigaba ezinkulu.
mt: 2016 film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, won all major awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Ihansana kanye Netshe bakhethelwa ukuthola umklomelo Womdlali Nomdlalikazi Ohamba Phambili ngokulandelana.
mt: 2 men were arrested for trying to steal a car with a woman inside.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Abanye abakhethiwe bahlanganisa neSithombe Esihle Kakhulu, Umqondisi Webhayisikobho, Umklami Wezimpahla, Umhleli-wefilimu, Umculo, Umklamo Womkhiqizo, Ukuhlelwa Komsindo, Ukuhlanganiswa Komsindo kanye Nombhalo weFilimu Wangempela.
mt: Other awards include the Best Actor, Best Actress, Best Director, Best Film, Best Music, Best Screenplay, Best Cinematography, Best Editing, Best Sound, Best Visual Effects, Best Art Direction, Best Costume Design, Best Makeup and Hairstyling, Best Production Design, Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Animated Feature Film, Best Documentary Feature, Best Foreign Language Film, Best Live Action Short Film, Best Animated Short Film, Best Documentary Short Subject, Best Makeup and Hairstyling, Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Animated Feature Film, Best Documentary Feature, Best Foreign Language Film, Best Live Action Short Film, Best Animated Short Film, Best Documentary Short Subject, Best Makeup and Hairstyling, Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Animated Feature Film, Best Documentary Feature, Best Foreign Language Film, Best Live Action Short Film, Best Animated Short Film, Best Documentary Short Subject, Best Makeup and Hairstyling, Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Animated Feature Film, Best Documentary Feature, Best Foreign Language Film, Best Live Action Short Film, Best Animated Short Film, Best Documentary Short Subject, Best Makeup and Hairstyling, Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Animated Feature Film, Best Documentary Feature, Best Foreign Language Film, Best Live Action Short Film, Best Animated Short Film, Best Documentary Short Subject, Best Makeup and Hairstyling, Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Animated Feature Film, Best Documentary Feature, Best Foreign Language Film, Best Live Action Short Film, Best Animated Short Film, Best Documentary Short Subject, Best Makeup and Hairstyling, Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Animated Feature Film, Best Documentary Feature, Best Foreign Language Film, Best Live Action Short Film, Best Animated Short Film, Best Documentary Short Subject, Best Makeup and Hairstyling, Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Animated Feature Film, Best Documentary Feature, Best Foreign Language Film, Best Live Action Short Film, Best Animated Short Film, Best Documentary Short Subject, Best Makeup and Hairstyling, Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Animated Feature Film, Best Documentary Feature, Best Foreign Language Film, Best Live Action Short Film, Best Animated Short Film, Best Documentary Short Subject, Best Makeup and Hairstyling, Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Animated Feature Film, Best Documentary Feature, Best Foreign Language Film, Best Live Action Short Film, Best Animated Short Film, Best Documentary Short Subject, Best Makeup and Hairstyling, Best Original Score, Best Original Song, Best Animated Feature Film, Best Documentary Feature
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Izingoma ezimbili ezivela kuyifilimu, Ukulalela (Iziphukuphuku Eziphuphayo) kanye neDolobha leziNkanyezi, zakhethwa ukuthi zithole umklomelo wengoma yangempela ehamba phambili. Isitshudiyo se-Lionsgate sikhethwe izikhathi ezingu-26 — ukudlula noma esiphi isitshudiyo.
mt: 2 films, The Hunger Games (The Hunger Games) and The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn, were announced to be released in 3D. Lionsgate was given a 26-week exclusive window for 3D releases.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Ntambama ngeSonto, uMongameli waseMelika u-Donald Trump, esitatimendeni esikhishwe unobhala wephephandaba, umemezele ukuthi amasosha aseMelika azoshiya elaseSiriya.
mt: On Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump, in a tweet, announced that U.S. sanctions on Syria would be lifted.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Isimemezelo senziwa ngemva kokuba u-Trump eshayele uMongameli waseTheki uRecep Tayyip Erdoğan ucingo.
mt: The meeting was announced after Trump met with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: ITheki izophatha ukugada amasosha we-ISIS athunjiwe lawo, ngokwesitatimende, amazwe waseYurophu anqabe ukuwalanda.
mt: The German government has decided to stop sending arms to ISIS, according to a report, after the group used the weapons to kill civilians.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Lokhu akugcini nje ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi okungenani amanye ama-dinosaur ayenezimpaphe, inkolelo-mbono ebanzi kakade, kepha inikezela imininingwane imivubukulo engayinikezi ngokujwayelekile, njengombala nokuhleleka kwezinhlangothi ezintathu.
mt: This is not the first time that dinosaurs have been linked to the extinction of other species, but it is the first time that the extinction has been linked to a previously unknown, and not previously well-understood, extinction event, such as the asteroid impact or volcanic activity.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Ososayensi bathi iplamu lalesi silwane lalinesifuba esinsundu ngaphezulu siphaphathekile nokumibalabala emaceleni.
mt: . Scientists say the new strain of bird flu is highly pathogenic and highly transmissible.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Ucwaningo lunikeza nokuqonda ngokuvela kwezimpaphe ezinyonini.
mt: The study suggests that the cause of the crash was a bird strike.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Ngenxa yokuthi izimpaphe zama-dinosaur aziso isiqu esikhule kahle, osibizwa ngokuthi i-rachis, kodwa zinezinye izici zezimpaphe — izindlendla kanye nama-barbule — abacwaningi baphethe ngokuthi i-rachis cishe bekungukwakheka kokuziphendukela kunalezinye izici.
mt: Because the tails of dinosaurs are so well preserved, the so-called rachis, but other parts of the tail — the vertebrae and barbules — are often thought to be the result of post-mortem damage.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Ukwakheka kwezimpaphe kusikisela ukuthi bezingasetshenziselwa ukundiza kodwa kunalokho ukulawula ukushisa kanye nokuzibonakalisa. Abacwaningi basikisela ukuthi, nakuba lona kungumsila we-dinosaur encane, isampula liveza izimpaphe zendala futhi hhayi isihluphe somntwanyana.
mt: 3D printing is not yet ready for human use, but it is possible that in the future, it could be used to print replacement organs. Some researchers say, although this is a dinosaur, the live cells are still alive and not a human embryo.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Abacwaningi basikisela ukuthi, ngisho noma lona kungumsila we-dinosaur, isampula liveza izimpaphe zendala futhi hhayi isihluphe somntwanyana.
mt: Some say, even if this is a dinosaur, it is a live dinosaur, not a fossil.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Ibhomu esemotweni eqhume esikhungweni samaphoyisa eGaziantep, eTheki izolo ekuseni ibulale amaphoyisa amabili futhi yalimaza abantu abanye abangaphezu kweshumi nambili.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and 12 others injured in a bomb blast in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Ihhovisi lombusi lithe abayishumi nesishiyagalolunye babengamaphoyisa.
mt: 11 police officers were injured.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Amaphoyisa athi asola osolwa ngokuba isosha leDaesh (ISIL) elinesikhundla ngenxa yalokhu kuhlasela.
mt: Police say they are investigating a possible link to the Daesh (ISIL) group because of the timing.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Bathole ukuthi ilanga lisebenza ngezimiso eziyisisekelo njengezinye izinkanyezi: umsebenzi wezinkanyezi zonke ohlelweni kutholakale ukuthi uqondiswa ukukhanya kwazo, ukuphenduka kwazo, futhi hhayi okunye.
mt: They say the sun is a star like all the others: its behavior is predictable, its movements are regular, and that's all.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Ukukhanya nokuphenduka kusetshenziswa ndawonye ukuthola inombolo yeRossby yenkanyezi, ehlobene nokugeleza kwe-plasma.
mt: The Rossby number is used to determine the stability of a plasma.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Uma i-Rossby inenombolo encane, inkanyezi ayibi namandla okudonsela emuva amakhulu.
mt: If the Rossby number is small, the moon has a chance to escape the Earth's gravity.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Phakathi naloluhambo, u-Iwasaki wahlangabezana nezinkinga kaningi.
mt: In between the two crashes, Iwasaki had a number of close calls.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Ubanjwe inkunzi yizigcwelegcwele zasolwandle, wahlaselwa yinja enesifo sobuhlanya e-Tibet, wabalekela umshado e-Nepal bese waboshwa eNdiya.
mt: A suspected terrorist was arrested in Tibet, and was deported to Nepal, where he was killed in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Isimiso se-802.11n sisebenza kokubili ezikhawini zokuthatheka komsindo ze-2.4Ghz kanye ne-5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n works on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Lokhu kuzoyivumela ukuthi ihambisane nezinhlelo zakudala ze-802.11a, i-802.11b kanye ne-802.11g, uma nje isikhungo sesiteshi sinemisakazo emibili.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are all backward compatible with this device.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Ijubane lika-802.11n liphezulu kakhulu kunelangaphambili elaligcina ejubaneni elingu-600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n is the fastest wireless standard currently available, with speeds up to 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: UDuvall, oshadile nonezingane ezimbili ezindalaa, akazange ahlabe u-Miller umxhwele, lowo otshelwe indaba.
mt: UDuvall, who has two children, said he was not aware of Miller's death until he heard the news.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Lapho ecelwa ukuthi aphawule, u-Miller uthe, “U-Mike ukhuluma kakhulu phakathi nokuthethwa kwecala...bengizilungiselela ngakho angikuzwanga ayekusho.”
mt: When asked if he was nervous, Miller said, “Mike talks a lot about the pressure...we’re not going to let him down.”
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Sizophumelela ukunciphisa inani lomoya ogcolile ngesikali se-GDP ngezinga eliphawulekayo ngo-2020 ukusuka esilinganisweni sango-2005," kusho u-Hu.
mt: "We will continue to reduce the share of the economy that is devoted to defense spending by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Akazange alibeke inani lezanhlukaniselwano, ethi zizokwenziwa ngokomphumela womnotho waseChina.
mt: It is not known how many were injured, but it is believed to be a result of a Chinese government protest.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: UHu ukhuthaze amazwe athuthukayo "ukugwema indlela yakudala yokugcolisa kuqala bese uhlanza kamuva."
mt: "The world's most advanced countries are 'backsliding' on early detection and treatment, and then they're trying to catch up," he said.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Wanezela ukuthi “akumelwe, nokho, bacelwe bathathe ukuzibophezela okungaphezu kwesigaba sabo sentuthuko, imithwalo yemfanelo kanye namakhono.”
mt: “We were told that we were safe, but we were not prepared for the extent of the damage, the destruction and the loss of life,”
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: IQembu Locwaningo lase-Iraq lethule umbiko walo ngo-12,00 GMT namuhla.
mt: 12:00 GMT today, the Iraqi government announced a new cabinet.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Iyaxwayisa Akekho ongaqinisekisa ukuthi nanoma iyiphi inkambo e-Iraq okwamanje izoqeda impi yamahlelo, ubudlova obukhulayo, noma ukuthambekela ebuxakalaleni.
mt: It is not yet clear whether the attack was a suicide bombing, a car bomb, or a roadside bomb.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: UMbiko uvula ngesicelo senkulumo-mpikiswano evulekile kanye nokwenziwa kokuvumelana eMelika ngesimiso saseNingizimu ePhakathi.
mt: A bill to repeal the Defense of Marriage Act was introduced in the U.S. House of Representatives.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Umbiko ugxeka kakhulu cishe zonke izici zesimiso samanje sesiGungu sase-Iraq futhi ucela ukuba kube noshintsho olusheshayo lwenkambo.
mt: The report was severely damaged by fire and is believed to be a fake.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Okokuqala phakathi kokutusa kwayo okungu-78 ukuthi isinyathelo sokuxhumana kumelwe sithathe ngaphambi kokuphela kwalonyaka ukuvikela imingcele yase-Iraq ekungeneleni konya kanye nasekumiseni kabusha ubuhlobo bokuxhumana nomakhelwane bayo.
mt: 78 years ago, the first transatlantic radio broadcast was made before the end of the year to help the war effort in Iraq and to keep in touch with the troops.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Ilungu lesigele lamanje kanye noNkosikazi kaMongameli wase-Argentina uCristina Fernandez de Kirchner umemezele ukungenela kwakhe ukhetho lokuba umongameli izolo ntambama eLa Plata, idolobha elingamakhilomitha angu-50 (amamayela angu-31) kusuka eBuenos Aires.
mt: 50-year-old former President of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president in 2019, from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: UNkk. Kirchner umemezelo inhloso yakhe yokukhankasela ukuba umongameli eThiyetheni yase-Ajenthina, indawo efanayo ayisebenzisele ukuqala umkhankaso wakhe wokuba ilunga leSigele njengelunga lamanxusa esifunda sase-Buenos Aires.
mt: 1. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president of Argentina, a position she has held twice before.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Inkulumo-mpikiswano idalwe ukuphikisana ngokuchitha imali eningi yokusiza kanye nokwakha kabusha ngemva kokudlula kweSiphepho iKatrina; leyo abesikhwama sezwe abadla ngoludala abayibize sakudlala ngokuthi “Isivumelwano sikaHlathi sase-Orleans eNtsha.”
mt: 2005 Hurricane Katrina relief efforts were criticized for being too slow and disorganized; the levee failures were blamed on the “Orleans Parish Levee Board.”
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Ukugxekwa okukhulu komzamo wokwakha kabusha kugxile ekuklomeliseni ukuvuselelwa kwezinkontileka ukuze baqonde ezangaphakathi zase-Washington.
mt: A major snowstorm is expected to hit the nation's capital to keep the city from shutting down.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyishumi baye enkonzweni yomngcwabo eRoma.
mt: 100 people were injured in a stampede at a concert in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Inani labantu ababekhona lalilikhulu kangangokuba kwakungenzeki ukuba wonke umuntu angene enkonzweni yomngcwabo eSt. Peter's Square.
mt: 100,000 people are estimated to have attended the event, which was the first time the Pope has celebrated the Easter vigil in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Izikrini ezinkulu eziningana zethelevishini zifakiwe ezindaweni ezihlukahlukene eRoma ukwenzela ukuthi abantu babukele umcimbi.
mt: Large crowds gathered in Rome to protest the government's austerity measures.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Kwamanye amazwe amaningi waseNtaliyane nasemhlabeni wonke, ngokukhethekile ePholandi, ukumiswa okufanayo kwenziwe, okubukwe abantu abaningi kakhulu.
mt: In many countries around the world, including South Africa, the use of the death penalty is common, and many people are executed.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Abezomlando bagxeke imithetho edlule yeFBI ngokugxila emacaleni alula ukuwaxazulula, ikakhulukazi amacala okuntshontshwa kwezimoto, ngenjongo yokukhuphula izinga lokuphumelela le nkampani.
mt: The FBI has been criticized for its handling of the investigation, especially the cars, in an effort to protect the company's reputation.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Ukhongolose waqala ukuxhasa ngezimali uhlelo olungamanyala ngesikhwama sezwe ngo-2005 futhi wachaza ukuthi i-FBI kumelwe inikele ngezisebenzi ezingu-10 ezithombeni ezingcolile zabantu abadala.
mt: 2005, the FBI began investigating the organization's finances and found that the group had spent over $10 million on personal expenses.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: URobin Uthappa wenza ama-innings abe aphezulu kakhulu, wenze ama-runs awe-70 kumabhola awu-41 nje ngokushaya ama-fours awu-11 kanye nama-sixes amabini.
mt: Robin Uthappa  scored a big innings, scoring 70 runs off 41 balls with 11 fours and two sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Amadoda abhethayo-bat kwikhilikithi adlalela phakathi, u-Sachin Tendulkar no-Rahul Dravid, bedlale kahle futhi benza umsebenzisano wokugijima ka-100.
mt: 100-run partnership between Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid was completed without any problems.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Kodwa, ngemva kokuba kukhiswhe ukaputeni wayo, iNdiya yenze amaphuzu angu-36 kuphela ilahlekelwa amawikhethi angu-7 kuze kube sekugcineni kwengxenye yomdlalo.
mt: 36 missiles were fired, but only seven hit their targets, according to the Indian government.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: UMongameli waseMelika uJoji W. Hlathi ufike eSingapho ekuseni ngoNovemba 16, eqalisa uhambo lwakhe lweviki lokuvakashela i-Asia.
mt: U.S. President Joe W. Bush arrived in Singapore on November 16, to begin a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Wabingelelwa iPhini likaNdunankulu uWong Kan Seng futhi baxoxa ngezinkinga zezentengiselwano kanye nezokuvakasha kanye noNdunankulu waseSingapore uLee Hsien Loong.
mt: The Prime Minister of Singapore, Wong Kan Seng, and his deputy, Lee Hsien Loong, were also present.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Ngemva kweviki lokulahlekelwa okhethweni lwaphakathi nesikhathi, uBhush watshela izilaleli ngokukhulisa ezentengiselwano e-Asia.
mt: After the initial confusion and delay, the Bush administration announced a new Asia policy.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: UNdunankulu uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela 'Umthetho woMoya Ohlanzekile' ukuba uhlolwe ikomiti lamaqembu onke, ngaphambi kokuba ufundwe okwesibili, ngemva komhlangano wangoLwesibili wemizuzu engu-25 nomhloli weNDP uJack Layton kuyi-PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has announced the "Clean Air Act" will be introduced to Parliament, before the second session, after the February 25th budget and NDP leader Jack Layton's opposition to the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: U-Layton ucele kube nezinguquko endleleni yokukhipha irisidi yesikweletu phakathi nomhlangano nama-PM, ecela kube “nokubhalwa kabusha okuphelele” kwendlela yokukhipha irisidi yesikweletu.
mt: Layton said the process of selecting a new speaker was “a very difficult and sensitive” one.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Kusukela ngesikhathi Uhulumeni Wenhlangano Yamazwe ungenela ekuphatheni uxhaso lwesibhedlela i-Mersey eDevonport, eThasmaniya, uhulumeni wezwe kanye namanye amalungu kahulumeni wenhlangano yamazwe asola lesi senzo njengesandulela sokhetho lukahulumeni oluzokwenziwa ngoNovemba.
mt: From next month, the UK government will begin a public consultation on the proposed expansion of the Devonport naval base in Plymouth, UK, with the government and other signatory countries agreeing on the design of the facility to be built by November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Kodwa uNdunankulu uJohn Howard uthe umthetho kwakungowokulondoloza izakhiwo zesibhedlela ukuba zingabekwa ezingeni eliphansi uhulumani waseTasmania, ngokunikeza izigidi engu-AUD$45.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the legislation was designed to protect the rights of Tasmanian residents, by removing the state's right to legalise euthanasia.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Ngokwencwajana yezindaba yakamuva, amazinga omthamo olwandle aveze ukuthi i-tsunami yenzekile. Bekune-tsunami ebekhona erekhodwe eduze nePago Pago kanye neNiue.
mt: Later reports indicate that a tsunami warning was issued. There is no tsunami reported in Pago Pago or Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Awukho umonakalo omkhulu noma ukulimala okubikiwe eTonga, kodwa ugesi ubungekho okwesikhashana, lokho okubikwa ukuthi kuvimebele iziphathimandla zaseTonga ekutholeni isexwayiso setsunami esikhishwe iPTWC.
mt: There is no major damage or loss of life reported in Tonga, but the government is on alert for possible tsunami following a Pacific Tsunami Warning Center issued tsunami watch.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Izikole eziyishumi nanye eHawaii ezisendaweni noma eziseduze nogu bezivaliwe ngoLwesithathu wonke nangaphezu kokususwa kwesixwayiso.
mt: 11 Hawaii schools were closed or on lockdown after a student was found with a gun on Wednesday.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Umongameli waseMelika uGeorge W Bush wasamukela isimemezelo.
mt: U.S. President George W Bush was briefed.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Umkhulumeli kaBush uGordon Johndroe ubize isithembiso seNyakatho Korea "ngesinyathelo esiyinhloko emgomweni wokususwa kwezikhali zenuzi okungafakazelwa enhlonhlweni yaseKorea."
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the North Korea "is a serious threat to the security of your people and the world" in a statement issued from Seoul.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Isiphepho seshumi esinikwe igama senkathi yeziPhepho zase-Atlantic, iSiphepho Sendawo Efudumele uJerry, saqala oLwandlekazini i-Atlantic namuhla.
mt: 5th Atlantic hurricane of the season, Hurricane Jerry, began in the Atlantic Ocean today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: INational Hurricane Center (NHC) ithi kulenkathi iJerry ingaba nosongo ezweni.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says Jerry is expected to move over land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Ibutho laseMelika loNjiniyela lilinganise ukuthi ukuna kwemvula kwamayintshi angu-6 angafohla uhide lwezindundumela ezimoshekile esikhathini esidlule.
mt: 6 inches of snow fell in the last 24 hours, according to the National Weather Service.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Iwodi Lesishiyagalolunye, elabonakala likhukhuleka ngamagxathu angu-20 phakathi Nesiphepho u-Katrina, okwamanje linamanzi asokhalweni njengoba amanzi elweqe ngaphezulu udonga lokuvimba amanzi oluseduze.
mt: 20th anniversary, seen as a storm of the century, Hurricane Katrina, which flooded New Orleans, as the water rose above the levees.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Amanzi ayachitheka ngaphezu kohide lwezindundumela engxenyeni engamafidi angu-100 ububanzi.
mt: 100 gallons of fuel spilled from the plane's tanks.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Umqondisi weCommons u-Adam Cuerden uzwakalise ukukhungatheka kwakhe ngokusulwa ngemva kokukhuluma ne-Wikinews ngenyanga edlule.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden announced his retirement after speaking with Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Yena [uWales] ngokuyisisekelo ukhulume amanga kusuka ekuqaleni. Okokuqala, ngokushaya sengathi lokhu bekungenxa yezizathu ezingokomthetho. Okwesibili, ngokuzishaya sengathi wayesilalele, kuze kube sekususweni kobuciko bakhe."
mt: "He [Wales] was a very good husband from the beginning. First, it seemed like he was a good citizen. Second, it seemed like he was a good father, because he was always there for his children."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Ukudineka komphakathi kwaholela emzamweni wamanje wokubhala umthetho ophathelene nezindaba zobulli ezingosini ezihlinzeka izinkulungwane ngezindaba ezigunyaziwe ezisemthethweni.
mt: A public outcry has led to the writing of a law regarding the reporting of news stories in the country.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Umsebenzi owenziwe bekungowomcabango kakhulu, kodwa uhlelo lubhalelwe ukulingisa okubonwe emthaleni weSagittarius.
mt: The work is not yet complete, but the project is expected to be finished by the end of the Sagittarius constellation.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Umphumela iqembu ebeliwulindele ubuzobangelwa amandla adonsayo phakathi kwesigaxa esimnyama somthala nesigaxa esimnyama somthala i-Milky way.
mt: A galaxy cluster is being torn apart by the gravitational pull of a supermassive black hole in the center of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Njengoba inyanga idonsa umhlaba, ubangele ukuphakama kwamanzi olwandle, kanjalo neMilky Way idonsa umthala weSagittarius.
mt: As the Earth rotates, the water level drops, as does the Milky Way, which rotates with the galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Ososayensi bakwazile ukuphetha ngokuthi izigaxa ezimnyama zithinta ezinye izigaxa ezimnyama ngendlela izigaxa ezijwayelekile ezenza ngayo.
mt: Scientists have found that black holes swallow other black holes in a way that normal black holes do not.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Isichasiselo sithi okumnyama okuzungeze umthala kuzungeze umthala njengendingilizi yokukhanya yohlobo oluthile, futhi kwenziwe ngezinto ezincane eziningi.
mt: It is believed that the bird was attracted to the bird feeder by the bright colors, and was made of many small parts.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Imibiko yethelevishini ibonisa intuthu emhlophe iphuma esitshalweni.
mt: 9News footage shows a white object rolling out of the hangar.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Iziphathimandla zasendaweni zixwayisa abahlali abaseduze nendawo yemboni ukuba bahlale ezindlini, bacime izipholisa-moya futhi bangaphuzi amanzi ompompi.
mt: Authorities closed roads and evacuated nearby residents, shut down water and power supplies.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Ngokwenkampani yenuzi yaseJapani, imisebe yenuzi ye-caesium ne-iodine itholakale endaweni yokusebenzela.
mt: 1.5 km (0.93 mi) from the plant, the radiation level is 10 times the normal level.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Iziphathimandla zicabangela ukuthi lokhu kubonisa ukuthi iziqukathi ebeziqukethe amafutha e-uranium endaweni yokusebenzela kungenzeka ukuthi ziqhumile futhi ziyavuza.
mt: The authorities are concerned that this may indicate that the uranium ore in the area is likely to be contaminated and radioactive.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: UDkt. Tony Moll wathola Ixhwala Elimelene Nemithi Kakhulu (iXDR-TB) esindeni esiseNingizimu Afrika KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll has identified a cluster of extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal province of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Uma kuxoxwa naye, uthe uhlobo olusha “luyakhathaza kakhulu futhi luyashaqisa ngenxa yezinga eliphezulu lokubulala.”
mt: “It’s a very dangerous and deadly weapon,” he said.
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Ezinye iziguli zithole igciwane esibhedlela, kucabanga uDkt. Moll, futhi okungenani ababili bekuyizisebenzi zempilo zasesibhedlela.
mt: Other injuries were reported, including Dr. Moll, and two others were also working at the hospital.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
